sharing.title: Sharing Your Memes
sharing.description:
Tap the share button to save or share your meme. You can:
• Save to your device
• Share on social media
• Copy to clipboard

tips.title: Pro Tips
tips.list:
• Use the Impact font for classic meme style
• Position text at top and bottom
• Keep text short and punchy
• Use contrasting colors
